attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in MPs who voted against free meals for children
attributes.additional_details: Because hungry children should have stopped existing in Victorian times
attributes.background: Give free meals to struggling families, it didn’t need a vote, it’s as clear as day you should be supporting vulnerable families

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for votes of no confidence.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Fund free school meals over school holidays until April 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555727

Provide the free school meal entitlement throughout the year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555723

End child food poverty – no child should be going hungry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554276

If you would like local communities to be able to recall MPs, you might also like to sign this petition:

Amend the Recall of MPs Act 2015 to allow communities sole power to recall MPs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548400
